scenario_text.value: Let him rest here. We need to hurry on.
Is it safe to leave him here?

If we make it obvious that we’re moving out,
he shouldn’t be in any danger.

Haru got too worked up and fainted,
so the enemy shouldn’t bother touching him.
Right... None of us can stay here, either.

I hate having to say this but...we should
just let Haru sleep here.

Garurumon, do you know where they are keeping
Miyuki?

I’ve been defeated, so it won’t matter if
I tell you.

At the top of those stairs in the back.
Hurry now.

Thank you, Garurumon.
Let’s go, everyone.

When the battle is over, you and I should
talk.

About all that has happened. About your
feelings. I want to hear it all.

And I... I will make it up to you.
At the very least.
